long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: The Chrome app would refresh the OpenAI GPT-3 chat website whenever an error occurs on the page. The app would monitor the page for any error messages or signs of failure, and automatically refresh the page if it detects an issue. This app would be particularly useful for users who frequently use the OpenAI GPT-3 chat website, and want to ensure that the page is always functioning properly without having to manually refresh the page in the event of an error. With this app installed, users can continue their conversation with the GPT-3 chatbot without interruption, as the app will handle refreshing the page in the background whenever an error occurs.
